description: I am a proud Houston native living and creating in Los Angeles where I have established myself as a program artist at Shockboxx Gallery and The LAAA (Gallery 825).  My techniques include charcoal, acrylic, spray paint, oil pastel, ink, resin and using burning candles to paint with the smoke. I draw inspiration from my own mental health journey as well as trending topics in modern society. By combining both, my style comes alive with bold, snarky, and colorful statement pieces.
